metadata.siteTitle: SaaS Anatomy - The Guide to Building a Profitable SaaS
metadata.siteDescription: Learn to build profitable SaaS products from A to Z. From idea to launch, master the anatomy of successful SaaS businesses.
metadata.keywords: SaaS, development, startup, tutorial, guide, business, product, monetization

hero.badge: The guide to going from side project to real revenue
hero.title: Analyze the SaaS that <highlight>actually make money</highlight>
hero.description: Discover the secrets of thriving businesses: how they monetize, find their users, and which tools they use. All broken down so you can apply these strategies to your own SaaS.

whatYouLearn.feature4Name: What you can reuse for your business
whatYouLearn.feature4Description: Concrete strategies you can apply even solo.
whatYouLearn.bottomMessage: SaaS Anatomy is made to be <bold>useful</bold>, not just informative.

latestAnalyses.title: Latest <highlight>business analyses</highlight>
latestAnalyses.description: Concrete analyses that reveal how these SaaS <bold>really</bold> generate their revenue
latestAnalyses.noArticlesDescription: Come back soon to discover our analyses!

whyThisBlog.title: Why SaaS Anatomy can <highlight>really help you</highlight>
whyThisBlog.paragraph1: Building a profitable SaaS takes much more than a good idea. You need to understand how to attract users, monetize effectively, and choose the right tools to scale without breaking the bank.
whyThisBlog.paragraph2: SaaS Anatomy analyzes <bold>SaaS that actually generate revenue</bold> to break down their growth strategies, pricing models, tech stack, and acquisition channels. The goal? Help developers, indie hackers, and digital product creators <bold>launch faster and smarter</bold>.
whyThisBlog.paragraph3: Rather than starting from scratch, discover how entrepreneurs and teams have built profitable businesses, the mistakes they avoided, and the tactics that truly made a difference. Concrete analyses, no BS, to go from idea to revenue.
whyThisBlog.reason1Description: Decode strategies of profitable SaaS rather than following theories
whyThisBlog.reason2Description: Detailed analyses of business models that actually work
whyThisBlog.reason3Description: Avoid common mistakes by learning from already validated projects

newsletter.title: Get the <highlight>best analyses</highlight> directly
newsletter.description: Every month, discover how SaaS generate revenue and apply these strategies to your own project. No theory, just actionable insights.
newsletter.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
newsletter.noSpam: No spam. Unsubscribe in one click. Monthly newsletters only.

footer.brandDescription: Analysis of profitable SaaS to help you build your own digital business.

blog.metaTitle: SaaS Anatomy Blog - Guides and Strategies for Profitable SaaS
blog.metaDescription: Discover how the most profitable SaaS generate revenue. Guides, tutorials, and strategies to build your SaaS from A to Z.
blog.heroDescription: Explore how the most profitable SaaS generate revenue and apply these strategies to your own project.
blog.noArticlesDescription: First analyses coming soon. Come back to discover the secrets of profitable SaaS!
blog.dontMissDescription: Get new analyses directly by email.

analyzer.metaDescription: Audit your landing page copywriting for free. Detailed score on 10 criteria: clarity, value proposition, CTA, social proof, and more.
analyzer.heroDescription: Find out if your copywriting truly converts your target audience. 10 criteria analyzed by AI for an actionable report.
analyzer.formNote: Free. 3 analyses per day. Results in under 30 seconds.
analyzer.howItWorksDescription: The tool analyzes the text content of your page (headings, text, CTAs, structure) via an AI calibrated on 10 SaaS copywriting criteria.
analyzer.step1Description: Enter your landing page address in the form above.
analyzer.step2Description: AI analyzes the content, headings, CTAs, and structure of your page.
analyzer.step3Description: Get a score out of 100 and concrete recommendations for each criterion.
analyzer.faq1A: The tool evaluates 10 criteria: 5-second clarity, target audience, value proposition, measurable outcome, CTA, problem articulation, social proof, differentiation, objection handling, and structure.
analyzer.faq2A: Yes, 100% free. You can analyze up to 3 pages per day. The first 4 criteria are directly accessible, the remaining 6 after subscribing to the newsletter.
analyzer.faq3Q: How does the analysis work technically?
analyzer.faq3A: We extract the text content of your page (headings, CTAs, text, structure) then an AI analyzes the copywriting quality based on 10 criteria calibrated for SaaS.
analyzer.faq4A: We only store the public content of the analyzed page and your email if you choose to subscribe. No sensitive data is collected.
analyzer.unlockDescription: Access the remaining 6 criteria and personalized rewrite suggestions to improve your page.
analyzer.noSpam: No spam. Unsubscribe in one click.
analyzer.improvementSubtitle: Rewrite suggestions based on your current content
analyzer.rewritesError: Rewrite suggestions could not be generated.
analyzer.noRemainingAnalyses: You've used all your analyses for today. Come back tomorrow!
analyzer.twitterShareText: My site {domain} scored {score}/100 on a copywriting audit!
analyzer.analyzeFreely: Analyze your landing page for free on
analyzer.metaKeywords: copywriting audit, landing page copywriting analysis, SaaS copywriting, optimize landing page, sales page audit, conversion rate
analyzer.metaOgDescription: Audit your page's copywriting in 30 seconds. 10 criteria analyzed by AI with concrete recommendations.
analyzer.toolSchemaDescription: Free copywriting audit tool for SaaS founders. Score on 10 criteria with actionable recommendations.
analyzer.reportMetaDescription: Copywriting audit result for {domain}. Overall score: {score}/100. Discover the detailed analysis on 10 criteria.
